text: Mam ay yad okok. Nɨbi kuŋay Klays binɨb ne kɨlop takaw agñɨtep gep wog ak ma gɨnɨmɨb. God ne binɨb kɨlop tɨg asɨk bɨlokɨnɨgab ñɨn ak, chɨn Klays binɨb ne kɨlop takaw agñɨtep gep wog ak gɨpun okok, chɨnop wog gɨpun okok tɨg asɨk tep gɨnɨgab. Anɨb ak nɨbi kuŋay agñɨtep gep wog ak gɨnɨgun agɨl gos ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
